title: 1.1498 STATE PHOTOGRAPH.
text:
The world-renowned photograph "Grace," depicting an elderly man bowing his head and giving thanks, taken in Bovey, Minnesota, in 1918, by Eric Enstrom, is designated as the state photograph.
A copy of the photograph "Grace" must be displayed in the Office of the Secretary of State.

variables.name: photographer
variables.description: The photographer who took the photograph.

variables.name: year_taken
variables.description: The year the photograph was taken.

variables.name: location
variables.description: The location where the photograph was taken.

variables.name: office
variables.description: The office where the photograph is displayed.

variables.name: displayed
variables.description: Whether the photograph is displayed in the specified office.

consequences: A copy of the photograph 'Grace' must be displayed in the Office of the Secretary of State.
